definition: plant with fleshy roots and erect stems with narrow succulent leaves and one reddish-orange flower in each upper leaf axil
details:
noun
- plant with fleshy roots and erect stems with narrow succulent leaves and one reddish-orange flower in each upper leaf axil
= synonyms: flame flower
- a plant of the genus Kniphofia having long grasslike leaves and tall scapes of red or yellow drooping flowers
= synonyms: flame flower
